(Damn, Skulletron STILL has everyone and everything blowing him to pieces,
and he's just laying there!!!  Well, people, I am NOT going to let my best,
or 2nd and 3/4 best, die!!!!)

::Skulletron::

          Skulletron is just laying there in his own mechfluid puddle, when
suddenly, his eyes open after just having a chunk of metal blown out of his
back.

       "AAAAHHHHHH!!!!!!!  I CAN'T TAKE THIS ANYMORE!!!!!!!!!!!!!"
Skulletron screamed.

      Then, his eyes went red, like before.  Anger built up rapidly inside
him.  Skulletron was having the anger surge in him again.  He stomped over
to Torca, and grabbed his dorsal gun, attempting to crush it, with ferocious
might.
